svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Meat consumption vs. GDP per capita, 2013
Average meat consumption per capita, measured in kilograms per year versus gross domestic product (GDP) per
capita measured in 2011 international-$. International-$ corrects for price differences across countries. Figures do
Source: UN FAO; World Bank, World Development Indicators
